title: Notwithstanding anything contained in these Regulations, no amenity space is required to be left for development of plot/land up to 2
clause_text: Notwithstanding anything contained in these Regulations, no amenity space is required to be left for development of plot/land up to 2.00 Hectare for Smart Fin Tech Centre.
section: 33(13)(A) Buildings of Smart Fin Tech Centre

source_pdf.text_snippet: Notwithstanding anything contained in these Regulations, no amenity space is required to be left for development of plot/land up to 2.00 Hectare for Smart Fin Tech Centre.
